Posts.Content: Leo1975 wrote: Hello not sure if this thread has been started yet, I searched but did not see it so I thought lets get this started. I get my port placed this morning, looking at starting late next week or first few days of June. I will be getting A-CT, radiation and then surgery with recon. I meet with the oncologist later this afternoon to confirm final plan since my node biopsy came back positive this past Tuesday. I am not going to even pretend this has not been a sucky week but it is what it is and I can only take the facts and go in fighting knowing I have the most appropriate treatment. Dx 4/18/2015, IDC, Right, 2cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, 1/2 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- (FISH) Chemotherapy 6/2/2015 AC + T (Taxotere) Surgery Mastectomy; Reconstruction (left): DIEP flap; Reconstruction (right): DIEP flap Radiation Therapy Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: June 2015 Starting Chemo Leo1975 Yoxter123
